Yesterday I asked you all to DM me if you could beta-read my book. Less than 24 hours later literally ~200 of you have DMed me -- I was expecting like 10. I am blown away. 

As a way to say thanks, I'm sending everyone who DMed me a 100% off coupon code to http://MachineLearningFlashcards.com
